text: so I think the turkeys ready smells
ready it's been enough time so now I'm
going to take its temperature so I've
been using a probe thermometer into the
thickest part of the thigh right over
here and it says 165 but I want a second
opinion so I'm going to use this instant
read thermometer and I'm just going to
check the breast and the other thigh it
takes about a few seconds for it to
reach temperature okay bingo and this is
about 164 it'll come up that extra
degree as it sits your turkey is
finished now cover it up with foil let
it rest for about a half an hour and you
